text: Valeriy Zuyev (November 5, 1952 - 6 May 2016) was a retired Soviet-born Ukrainian football player and coach. He was born in Kyiv. Zuyev played his only game for the USSR in 1975 in a UEFA Euro 1976 qualifier against Turkey. Zuyev died after a long illness in Kyiv on 6 May 2016, aged 63. ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile Category:1952 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Soviet footballers Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Sportspeople from Kyiv
title: Valeriy Zuyev
